page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN SPEKE.....
page.content: The pattern of employment in Speke has changed in recent years. Many large industrial firms have moved out of the area leaving . only a handful of industrial jobs. This has led to large scale unemployment in the area - 67%. Unemployment is a longterm problem-38% those unemployed have been so for more than 2 years. The only flourishing industry is the service industry.Shops make up the majority of employers. The 3 largest employers have been in the area the longest time - 64, 25, 22 years. Of these 3 employers,employing 330,190,120 people,none employs anyone in the 16-18 age range. Young people are either employed in shop work or work out of the area. There have been no industrial strikes in the area in the last year, which is substantiated by the fact that 95%....
